title: Kuroko no Basket: Oshaberi Shiyou ka
content:
MyAnimeList never gets tired of this, but neither do I, although, sometimes it's pretty jarring, however, it's more the show's fault.
What scares me from jumping on a franchise at first glance is the sheer size and content that make up the length of dozens of other shows, I do believe Code Geass is the pinnacle of filler content shitposting in form of Picture Dramas and whatnot, but Kuroko no Basket is creeping clearly on the former with its massive nonending recap episodes/movies that don't seem to know an end. Like seriously, seeing everything the series has to offer feels like rewatching the whole three seasonsthree times if not four.

They always try to laugh it off as a Fan Disc where they can do whatever they want, often breaking the fourth wall and laughing like they just told the greatest joke ever, but at the third freaking Fan Disc, it had already become stale and repetitive enough for me not to care, even after over a 5 months break from last seeing anything Kuroku no Basket related.
